subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Brian Kelly’s successes in 2010 — the program’s first win over Southern California since 2001 and second bowl win since 1994 — were overshadowed by off-field tragedies.
snippet: Brian Kelly’s successes in 2010 — the program’s first win over Southern California since 2001 and second bowl win since 1994 — were overshadowed by off-field tragedies.
